title: Review: In Takashi Miike’s ‘Yakuza Apocalypse,’ Blood and Fur Flies
text:
Published By: NYTimes Arts - Today 
This Maximalist plotter of chaos smashes together yakuza gangsters and vampires in his latest comic adventure....
